title: Trade Deadline Winners and Losers, KD Goes Off, and We Do Art | Heat Check
description:
Instant Replay: The Raptors just can’t seem to lose, Kevin Durant wants all the smoke, and James Dolan isn't selling the New York Knicks (02:05).
The Main Event: The gang breaks down the winners and losers of the trade deadline including the Heat and the Clippers, and even the Knicks (19:28).
Good Call/Bad Call: D'Angelo Russell has a camcorder, Dame D.O.L.L.A. performs at All-Star Weekend, and we do art (33:47).
Host: John Gonzalez
Guests: Haley O'Shaughnessy, Dan Devine

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
